CustomField.formula: IF(Submission_Date__c <> CR_Confirmation_Date__c, IF( /** Condition */ AND( (5 - (CASE(MOD( Submission_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0)) < (CASE(MOD( CR_Confirmation_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0)) ), ((( CR_Confirmation_Date__c - Submission_Date__c) + 1) < 7) ), /** Value to YES */ ( (CASE(MOD( CR_Confirmation_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0)) - (5 - (CASE(MOD( Submission_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0))) ), /** Value to NOT */ ( ((FLOOR((( CR_Confirmation_Date__c - Submission_Date__c ) - (CASE(MOD( Submission_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0))) / 7)) * 5) + (CASE(MOD( Submission_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0)) + (CASE(MOD( CR_Confirmation_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0)) ) ) ,0)
CustomField.label: Business Days for Confirmation
